visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a pie chart with the following specifications: Chart type: pie, Chart title: 'Monthly Sales Distribution', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark gray color (#333) for labels and titles, with a font size of 14px, Data series: Include three data points with the names 'January', 'February', and 'March' and values 29.9, 71.5, and 106.4 respectively, Custom colors: Use specific colors for each slice - #FF5733, #33FF57, and #3357FF, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to light gray (#f2f2f2), add a legend at the bottom of the chart, and set the chart margins to 50px on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a pie chart with specific customizations. The chart type is set to 'pie', and the title is 'Monthly Sales Distribution' with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px. The data series includes three data points named 'January', 'February', and 'March' with corresponding values 29.9, 71.5, and 106.4, each assigned a unique color. The chart background is set to light gray, and a legend is positioned at the bottom right of the chart. Additionally, the chart margins are set to 50px on all sides to provide ample space around the chart.
